cgimageinfodescribevalues.pro


Routines

cgDescribeThisImgValues, image, id, xpixel, ypixel
cgImageInfoDescribeValues, iimage, xpixel, ypixel [, hsh]

Provide information about the selected xy-pixel from an image, or a hash of images.

Routine details

Parameters

id
xpixel

top source cgImageInfoDescribeValues

cgImageInfoDescribeValues, iimage, xpixel, ypixel [, hsh]

Provide information about the selected xy-pixel from an image, or a hash of images.

Parameters

iimage in required type=image

A 2D or 3D image array

xpixel in required type=int

The X location on the image to fetch information from

ypixel in required type=int

The y location on the image to fetch information from

hsh in optional type=HASH

If a valid HASH, it should contain key/Image (string/array) pairs that will be described.
